sentences: Brandon Ebel is the founder, president and CEO of Tooth & Nail Records.
He founded the label in 1993 in California, United States.
The label has since grown to include sub-labels BEC Recordings, Solid State Records and Uprok Records.
Ebel has contributed to  hundreds of releases the label has put out.
Brandon was born in Dallas, Texas and attended Oregon State University, graduating in 1992 with Bachelor of Science in Broadcasting.
Brandon was a member of Sigma Phi Epsilon.
After receiving his degree, he started Tooth & Nail Records in his bedroom with a small loan.
He now resides in Seattle, Washington.
